(Calm • Airy • Hopeful • Slowly Brightening)
## 1. TRACK OVERVIEW
| Field | Value |
| Arc Name | Pre-Dawn / Sunrise Focus — Master Song Bank Arc |
| Purpose | Reusable morning-focus track generation |
| Duration Intent | 3 hours (18 tracks × ~10 min or extended) |
| Mood Arc | Early Dawn Calm → Gentle Lift → Golden Airflow → Morning Clarity |
| Anchor Phrase | sunrise calm focus |
## 2. MUSIC ARC STRUCTURE — 18 SUNO PROMPTS
### PHASE 1 — Early Dawn Stillness
(BPM 52–58 • Warm pads • Quiet • No percussion or very soft)
- [ ] 1. “warm ambient lofi pads, soft analog drift, minimal movement, gentle early calm tone” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 2. “airy vaporwave pads, quiet static texture, slow harmonic bloom, no rhythmic push” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 3. “subtle complex chords, warm reverb, mellow evolving pads, quiet introspective atmosphere” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 4. “soft harmonic layering, smooth analog character, light emotional undertone” — sunrise calm focus
### PHASE 2 — Gentle Lift (Beginning of Flow)
(BPM 60–68 • Light percussion • Warm, hopeful chords)
- [ ] 5. “midtempo lofi beat, warm analog bass, smooth uplifting chords, steady but gentle momentum” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 6. “soft rhythmic pads, light drum machine texture, warm tone shaping, stable early focus energy” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 7. “gentle upbeat lofi groove, warm synth layers, minimal percussion, subtle emotional rise” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 8. “steady lofi pulse, atmospheric pads, airy chord movement, calm focus flow” — sunrise calm focus
### PHASE 3 — Golden Airflow (Peak Clarity)
(BPM 66–72 • Bright but soft • Inspirational but not dramatic)
- [ ] 9. “bright vaporwave pads, clean analog bass, optimistic chord structure, light rhythmic support” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 10. “smooth atmospheric chords, subtle arps, warm layered synth textures, balanced emotional tone” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 11. “steady rhythmic focus track, soft percussive elements, open harmonic field, expanded airy feeling” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 12. “uplifting lofi synthscape, warm layered chords, clean minimal beat, energized clarity” — sunrise calm focus
### PHASE 4 — Morning Clarity (Soft Settle)
(BPM 55–60 • Decline energy gently • Return to ambient)
- [ ] 13. “ambient analog pads, softened rhythm, warm static, gradual easing of energy” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 14. “soft atmospheric chords, minimal percussion, mellow emotional tone, gentle float” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 15. “slow harmonic pads, subtle analog drift, calming reflective atmosphere” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 16. “quiet vaporwave textures, soft noise bed, long pad decays, peaceful spacing” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 17. “near-beatless ambient layer, soft tonal shifts, introspective calm” — sunrise calm focus
- [ ] 18. “final ambient fade, long reverb tail, minimal movement, restful closure” — sunrise calm focus
